author: Mendota Reporter
title: Chinn Foundation and Illinois Extension team up to inspire learning in classrooms - NewsBreak
text:
Mendota Reporter
website
Mendota
Chinn Foundation and Illinois Extension team up to inspire learning in classrooms
1 days ago
MENDOTA – Five fifth-grade classes at Northbrook Middle School in Mendota recently participated in Seeds to Harvest, a youth gardening program led by the University of Illinois Extension 4-H and Master Gardeners program. This six-week program introduced students to gardening and plant science through classroom instruction and outdoor activities.

author: Web Financial Group, S.A.
title: Els treballadors de Boeing, en vaga després de rebutjar l'acord d'empresa i sindicats - Bolsamania.com
text:
En castellano:Los trabajadores de Boeing, en huelga tras rechazar el acuerdo de empresa y sindicatos Boeing pateix la seva primera vaga en 16 anys. Els treballadors comencen aquest divendres les aturades després de rebutjar l'acord a què havien arribat els sindicats amb el fabricant d'avions.
BOEING CO 162,77$ 0,89% Al voltant del 95% dels membres del sindicat International Association of Machinist (IAM) ha votat en contra , en considerar-ho insuficient, del pacte que contemplava un increment general dels salaris del 25% en quatre anys.
Asseguren que els treballadors estan patint una dècada d'estancament salarial. La petició del sindicat incloïa augments del voltant del 40%.
"Es tracta de lluitar pel nostre futur. Tornarem a la taula sempre que puguem per impulsar les qüestions que els nostres membres diuen que són importants", ha assenyalat el president del sindicat IAM, Jon Holden.
Ha defensat que la vaga està justificada "per pràctiques laborals injustes ", ja que assegura que els treballadors han patit una " conducta discriminatòria, interrogatoris coercitius, vigilància il·legal i promeses il·legals de beneficis ".
Per part seva, el nou conseller delegat de Boeing, Kelly Ortberg, havia demanat que evitessin la vaga: "Demano que no sacrifiqueu l'oportunitat d'assegurar junts el nostre futur, per les frustracions del passat". Mentrestant, la CEO de la unitat d'avions comercials, Stephanie Pope, ha defensat que l'acord era el "millor que hem presentat mai".
Després del rebuig, més de 30.000 treballadors estan cridats a fer vaga des de divendres, aturant la producció de la majoria dels avions de la companyia.

author: antaranews.com
title: 148 suspected terrorists nabbed in 2023: BNPT
text: …throughout 2023, there were no acts of terrorism in Indonesia. This is an indication that the situation of security in Indonesia is improving.Jakarta (ANTARA) - The National Police's anti-terror squad, Special Detachment 88 (Densus 88), together with the Indonesian Military (TNI), arrested 148 suspected terrorists this year. Head of the National Counter-Terrorism Agency (BNPT), Rycko Amelza Dahniel, made the statement while delivering the year-end press release of the BNPT in Sentul, Bogor, West Java, on Friday. According to him, most of the suspected terrorists had links with the Jemaah Islamiyah (JI) and the Jamaah Ansharut Daulah (JAD) terror groups. JI and JAD are the two biggest terror networks in Indonesia and are directly affiliated with Al Qaeda and ISIS terrorist groups, Dahniel noted. He said that the arrests of the 148 suspected terrorists were linear with the decline in acts of terrorism in Indonesia. Throughout this year, not a single act of terror was recorded in the country. "Even though there were still a number of terror attacks in several countries, throughout 2023, there were no acts of terrorism in Indonesia. This is an indication that the situation of security in Indonesia is improving," he added. However, he appealed to all parties to stay alert against the dynamics of terrorist networks that enter society. Global terrorism networks are still carrying out acts of terror with women and children as their main targets, he said. "We must not be complacent. Radical acts against vulnerable groups, namely women, children, and teenagers, are still occurring," he stressed. Related news: [Densus 88 arrests 27 terror suspects in three provinces](https://en.antaranews.com/news/297273/densus-88-arrests-27-terror-suspects-in-three-provinces) Related news: [Police to anticipate terrorist attacks during 2024 General Election](https://en.antaranews.com/news/296415/police-to-anticipate-terrorist-attacks-during-2024-general-election) Related news: [Repatriation for terrorist-associated women met with pros and cons](https://en.antaranews.com/news/293028/repatriation-for-terrorist-associated-women-met-with-pros-and-cons)
